mapper.select: select id, chat_id, chat_type, sender_id, receiver_id, content_type, content, file_info, time, status, extra from neutron_im.messages where (sender_id = #{id1} and receiver_id = #{id2}) or (sender_id = #{id2} and receiver_id = #{id1}) order by time
mapper.insert: insert into neutron_im.messages(neutron_im.messages.id, chat_id, neutron_im.messages.chat_type, neutron_im.messages.sender_id, neutron_im.messages.receiver_id, neutron_im.messages.content_type, neutron_im.messages.content, neutron_im.messages.file_info, neutron_im.messages.time, neutron_im.messages.status, neutron_im.messages.extra) values (replace(uuid(), '-', ''), #{chat_id}, #{chat_type}, #{sender_id}, #{receiver_id}, #{content_type}, #{content}, #{file_info}, #{time}, #{status}, #{extra})
